name: invaders (itch) (jlunesc)
description:
This is a rip-off of the famous space invaders. I made it using Godot engine. Code available here: https://github.com/jlunesc/invaders

I am still working in the game balance. Feel free to leave a comment.

Use WASD to move and space to shoot.

Credits: 

Music: "DeltaBreaker" https://opengameart.org/users/deltabreaker (not done in collaboration nor exclusive for this project)

Font: https://fontenddev.com/fonts/poco/
